00036 const char *CommandLock::ms_usage[] = {
00037   "lock <file> <mode>",
00038   "  This command issues a LOCK request to Hyperspace.  The <mode> argument",
00039   "  may be either SHARED or EXCLUSIVE.",
00040   (const char *)0

00043 int CommandLock::run() {
00044   uint64_t handle;
00045   int error;
00046   uint32_t mode = 0;
00047   struct LockSequencer lockseq;
00048 
00049   if (m_args.size() != 2) {
00050     cerr << "Wrong number of arguments.  Type 'help' for usage." << endl;
00051     return -1;
00052   }
00053 
00054   if (m_args[0].second != "" || m_args[1].second != "") {
00055     cerr << "Invalid character '=' in argument." << endl;
00056     return -1;
00057   }
00058 
00059   if (m_args[1].first == "SHARED")
00060     mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
00061   else if (m_args[1].first == "EXCLUSIVE")
00062     mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00063   else {
00064     cerr << "Invalid mode value (" << m_args[1].second << ")" << endl;
00065     return -1;
00066   }
00067 
00068   if (!Util::get_handle(m_args[0].first, &handle))
00069     return -1;
00070 
00071   if ((error = m_session->lock(handle, mode, &lockseq)) == Error::OK)
00072     cout << "SEQUENCER name=" << lockseq.name << " mode=" << lockseq.mode << " generation=" << lockseq.generation << endl << flush;
00073 
00074   return error;
00075 }
